SHR Reference Model Version 1.0.0
cimi.element

Element Identifier

Documentation:

A unique string that identifies a specific person or thing.

Ancestors:
  • Identifier
Direct Descendants:
  • AccessionIdentifier, 
  • NationalProviderIdentifier, 
  • OrganizationIdentifier
Used By:
  • ExternalHealthRecord, 
  • SpecimenContainer, 
  • Study
